snippet.title: Johnny Depp Admits Defecating Incident Made Up His Mind to Divorce Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp Admits Defecating Incident Made Up His Mind to Divorce Amber Heard..
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChjDtGelMNkllI5S22oO_aA?sub_confirmation=1
 The 'Fantastic Beasts' actor's ex-wife is due to give evidence in the libel trial in mid-July, whereas his other exes Winona Ryder and Vanessa Paradis are expected to give evidence in his defense.   Jul 11, 2020   AceShowbiz - Johnny Depp decided to divorce Amber Heard after coming to believe she had defecated in his bed as revenge for a blazing birthday row, he told London's High Court on Friday, July 10.    The 57-year-old actor is suing the British tabloid The Sun's publisher News Group Newspapers (NGN), and its executive editor Dan Wootton, over a 2018 article which labelled him a "wife beater."         According to Britain's Daily Mail newspaper, in his fourth day in the witness box, Depp outlined how he and his ex-wife ended up arguing after he arrived late to her birthday party in April 2016.    During cross-examination, The Sun's lawyer, Sasha Wass, accused the star of throwing a champagne bottle at Heard during a fight after the party. He disputed the account, insisting she h ...
